maths.title: Turning Points & Firsts
maths.intro: Each round reveals a moment in history. Jot the year (1–4 digits), then add your five answers together.
maths.note: Years are AD only; closest total takes the round.

events.prompt: Gutenberg completes the first printed Bible in Mainz.
Delegates sign the United States Declaration of Independence.
Athens hosts the first modern Olympic Games.
The Berlin Wall falls, opening the border.
Astronomers release the first image of a black hole (M87*).

clues: Gutenberg completes the first printed Bible in Mainz.
Delegates sign the United States Declaration of Independence.
Athens hosts the first modern Olympic Games.
The Berlin Wall falls, opening the border.
Astronomers release the first image of a black hole (M87*).

maths.question: Enter the year you think this event happened (1–4 digits).
